      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static GameRomhacksRequest Spedran.getGameRomhacks​(String gameId)
      Gets a GameRomhacksRequest builder to request the romhacks of the specified Game.

    • Uses of GameRomhacksRequest in com.github.treescrub.spedran.data

      Methods in com.github.treescrub.spedran.data that return GameRomhacksRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      GameRomhacksRequest Game.getRomhacks()
      Gets a new GameRomhacksRequest builder object to request romhacks (derived games) for this game.
